title: TextContentFields
description: Textual content and content types fields of media content items in the Impresso project.

doc_type_s.description: Type of document, e.g., page (p) or content item (ci).

item_type_s.description: Type of content item, e.g., article, section.

lg_orig_s.description: Original language of the content item.

lg_s.description: Computed language of the content item.

content_length_i.description: Token count of the content item (space split).

snippet_plain.description: Snippet of the content item (first 150 characters).

title_txt.description: Title of the content item. This field is present when no language specific title fields are available (e.g. title_txt_f).

content_txt.description: Full text content of the content item. This field is present when no language specific content fields are available (e.g. content_txt_f).

^title_txt_[a-z]{2}$.description: Title of the article in the specified language (ISO 639-1 two-letter language code)

^content_txt_[a-z]{2}$.description: Full text content of the article in the specified language (ISO 639-1 two-letter language code)
